user_query: I want to analyze the SEO performance of my travel blog and get recommendations for optimization.

TaskList.description: Perform an on-page SEO analysis of the travel blog website to identify current performance metrics.
Analyze the title tags of the website and provide recommendations for optimization.
Examine the meta descriptions and suggest improvements.
Review the headings structure of the website and provide optimization tips.
Analyze the images used on the website for SEO optimization and suggest improvements.
Conduct a loading speed analysis of the website and provide recommendations for improvement.
